price: 48. Markaas ku shuba madaxiisa korkiisa cadaabka biyo kar-karaya.
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
